DOC.brief_title: Healthy Normal Volunteers Looking Exposure Effects Multiple Doses Technosphere速 Insulin ( TI ) Using Gen2C Inhaler
DOC.detailed_description: Healthy Normal Volunteers randomize sequence 4 different dos Technosphere速 Insulin ( TI ) , inhale use Gen2C device , one dose subcutaneously inject Regular Human Insulin . A euglycemic clamp procedure perform dose visit . The purpose study determine insulin dose proportionality/linearity Technosphere速 Insulin ( TI ) Inhalation Powder base AUCo-180 administration follow dos use Gen2C inhaler : - 10 U ( one 10 U cartridge ) - 30 U ( one 10 U one 20 U cartridge ) - 60 U ( three 20 U cartridge ) - 80 U ( four 20 U cartridge )
DOC.criteria: Men woman age 18 55 year consider healthy base screen physical examination , medical history , clinical chemistry , urinalysis Good venous access blood draw No smoking previous 6 month ( include cigarette , cigar , pipe ) negative urine cotinine testing ( < 100 ng/mL ) Body mass index ( BMI ) < 32 kg/m2 FEV1 = 80 % Third National Health Nutrition Examination Survey ( NHANES III ) predict FVC = 80 % Third National Health Nutrition Examination Survey ( NHANES III ) predict Written inform consent provide Blood donation 500 mL within previous 56 day Fasting blood sugar > 130 mg/dL History coronary artery disease , peripheral vascular disease , congestive heart failure Allergy study drug , food , study material ( eg , peanut , soy product ) Clinically significant active chronic illness History asthma , COPD , clinically relevant chronic lung disease Respiratory tract infection within 4 week screen Donation blood within 3 month screen History drug alcohol abuse Positive urine drug screen Clinically significant screening ECG , physical examination , laboratory test , vital sign abnormality Any subject , opinion PI designee , appear qualified study Exposure investigational drug device within 30 day treatment within 90 day treatment drug know modify glucose metabolism ( except metformin History malignancy within 5 year screen ( basal cell carcinoma ) History human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) infection hepatitis B C Women pregnant , lactating , plan become pregnant clinical study period Any subject Visit 2 blood glucose value = 150 mg/dL 2 hour meal , discuss MKC medical monitor may remove potentially impaired glucose tolerance Inability , opinion PI designee , adequately inhale TI Inhalation Powder Women childbearing potential ( define premenopausal surgically sterilize postmenopausal few 2 year ) practice adequate birth control . Adequate birth control define use oral , percutaneous , transdermal contraceptive ; condom diaphragms ( double barrier ) spermicide ; intrauterine device . Postmenopausal purpose clinical study include experience amenorrhea 2 year surgically sterile
